content: yo-yo pan protectors designed by lisa hounshell this pattern uses breakaway crochet method techniques if you haven t done so already please refer to the following instructional material before attempting this pattern for more information on the breakaway crochet method in general please visit the website to work a practice swatch using the 12 stitch yo-yo motif visit the breakaway crochet motif library for a demonstration of techniques used in this specific project please watch this youtube video materials for each pan protector yarn 1 ball flinders 8 ply cotton 1 76 ounces / 50 gms 126 yards / 115 meters hook us size g / 4mm stitch marker measurements large width = 15 ¾ / 39 cm small width = 12 ½ / 32 cm gauge diameter of 1 yo-yo = 1 / 2 5 cm abbreviations us terminology slip_stitch slip_stitch slstb slip_stitch between the current yo-yo and the next one join slip_stitch into the 6th double_crochet behind the hook double_crochet double_crochet fdc floating double_crochet ba breakaway from the current yo-yo and start a new one as instructed pattern notes because of their shape each pan protector is worked in sections after working the yo-yo that sits at the very center of either piece you will start 6 more yo-yos that surround the center yo-yo from there you will begin working the 6 sections all the sections are worked in basically the same way with slight variations in the first and last sections instructions all stitches are worked into the floating ring of the indicated motif unless otherwise stated small pan protector 1 center yo-yo fdc 11dc slip_stitch into next st 2 begin 6 yo-yos around center yo-yo fdc double_crochet ba fdc double_crochet join 2dc 4 times ba fdc double_crochet join 8dc first section 3 foundation row ba fdc 5dc ba fdc 2dc mark last st 3dc ba fdc 5dc 2times 4 return row 6dc slstb continue to next yo-yo 3 times 2dc in next yo-yo 5 joined foundation row fdc double_crochet join 2dc ba fdc double_crochet join 2dc join 2dc 2 times ba fdc double_crochet join 4dc 6 return row 6dc slstb continue to next yo-yo 3 times 2dc in next yo-yo 7 joined foundation row fdc double_crochet join 2dc ba fdc double_crochet join 2dc join 2dc 2 times 8 return row 6dc slstb continue to next yo-yo 2 times 8dc in next yo-yo slstb 9 finish this section 6dc in next yo-yo slstb 4dc in next yo-yo slstb 2dc in next yo-yo slstb second section 10 foundation row in next yo-yo 2dc join 2dc join 2dc 10 sts total in the yo-yo ba fdc double_crochet join 2dc join 2dc ba fdc double_crochet join 4dc ba fdc 5dc 2 times 11 return row 6dc slstb continue to next yo-yo 3 times 2dc in next yo-yo 12 joined foundation row fdc double_crochet join 2dc ba fdc double_crochet join 2dc join 2dc 2 times ba fdc double_crochet join 4dc 13 return row 6dc slstb continue to next yo-yo 3 times
